title: My account is gone
body: i redownloaded League of legends where ive been gone from it in a year and when i came back to it i had to reset my password and when i done this i logged in but insted of having my account it was gone and i had to make a new name on league and i lost everything but my old account (WispNinja) is gone and i now have this one (WilloWispy). Please i really want my old account back and to continue to enjoy league of legends. Please if you can fix this problem send me an email at (REMOVED) this is my primary email.

replies.body:
It sounds scary to come back and not have access to your account, and we'd like to help!  As a first step to just make sure, are you connected to the correct region on the patcher?  If that doesn't work, our [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) guide also has some steps towards regaining access.

If that fails, just hit us up directly through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416).  Our account recovery team will work with you individually to see what happened.  Don't worry, we got your back!
